alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Erath; Hamilton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 6:48PM CDT until May 04 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hamilton County in central Texas... South central Erath County in north central Texas... Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 647 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Byrds, or 13 miles north of Early, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Comanche, Gustine, Proctor Lake, Purves, Lamkin, Proctor, Hasse, Sidney, Edna Hill, Downing, Energy, Van Dyke, Beattie, Gentrys Mill and Carlton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
